name: Z.I.E.F.
description:
ZIEF is an atmospheric first-person shooter taking place after the world has stabilized from the zombie apocalypse. You are a part of an advanced military unit tasked with going back into zombie hot zones to gather supplies, recover lost technologies, and of course, execute the infected.

This is an early build of ZIEF. As this is an early build of our game features and gameplay are subject to change. Enjoy!
